name: Lumberjack John
description:
Lumberjack John [ The crop burglar strikes again ]

Your name is John and you are the best lumberjack in the city, but some people also know you as LJ the crop thief.

Although you enjoy your work, what you like most is to eat carrots, but since carrots do not grow on trees you have to steal them from farmers crops.

Most farmers already know your reputation and have installed ultra modern security measures.

Your goal is to collect the carrots without being detected.

But calm, the majority of security measures need a minimum time to correctly identify the person detected.
